message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product and your enthusiasm, but I was hoping to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $7500?
I understand that you're looking to keep your investment within budget, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $7500. How about we meet in the middle at $8500?
